title: Cellular Systems Engineer - Power
summary: At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish! Join us to help deliver system design and power optimization for wireless modems. As a member of systems engineering team working on cellular power, you will have the unique and rewarding opportunity to work on most exciting and ambitious problems related to power architecture and optimization. In our team, we have the mission to design and deliver most power efficient and optimized design for the wireless and cellular products. We are looking for expert and highly self-motivated system engineers to work on the most exciting problems related to cellular modem power optimization. In this role you will be working cross-functionally across many teams to drive the optimal power architecture starting with the product requirements all the way to commercialization. You will work on defining system level requirements, proposing innovative ideas, define power architecture, and perform power measurements driving the power optimizations to meet the product requirements.
description:
-  Work closely with the product teams to drive cellular modem power requirements and analysis of system level use-cases for power optimized operation.
-  Contribute to system design and power architecture in cellular modem. 
-  Study and analysis of post-Silicon power data and waveforms to identify potential optimization opportunities. 
-  Active participation in modem power measurement an optimization and work cross-functionally to drive the product to commercialization meeting the set power goals.
preferred_qualifications: Shown track-record of innovation and hands-on experience in working with pre-product silicon HW and power measurement setup.
